scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/wknd/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/wknd
  set jcr:title{String} to "WKND Sites Project"
end

create service user dam-read-only-service-user with path /home/users/system/wknd/serivce-users
 set ACL for dam-read-only-service-user
    allow jcr:read,rep:write on /content/dam/wknd
end

create group wknd-users-group with path /home/groups/wknd
set ACL for wknd-users-group
allow jcr:read,rep:write on /content/wknd
allow jcr:read,rep:write on /apps/wknd
allow jcr:read,rep:write on /conf/wknd
allow jcr:read,rep:write on /home
allow jcr:read on / 
end

create user wknd-user with path /home/users/wknd/custom-users with password 12345
add wknd-user to group wknd-users-group

create service user data-import-service-user with path /home/users/system/wknd/serivce-users
 set ACL for data-import-service-user
    allow jcr:read,rep:write on /data
end
